cv_tips_intro: Writing a great CV is your first step toward landing your dream job. Your CV is your personal marketing tool — it should reflect your skills, experience, and achievements in a clean and professional format.
cv_tips_design_title: 1. Keep Your Design Simple and Clean
cv_tips_design_desc: Avoid flashy colors or complex layouts. Use readable fonts and ensure that each section is clearly defined. A clean design helps recruiters find information easily and gives a strong first impression.
cv_tips_experience_desc: Don’t just list your responsibilities — highlight what you achieved in each role. Use action verbs like 'managed', 'developed', or 'increased'. Quantify your impact wherever possible (e.g., 'Increased sales by 20%').
cv_tips_skills_desc: Include both hard skills (like programming, design, or data analysis) and soft skills (like teamwork and communication). Tailor them to the job description for maximum impact.
cv_tips_education_desc: List your educational background in reverse chronological order. Include certifications or courses relevant to your field — especially recent ones that show continuous learning.
cv_tips_ats_desc: Many companies use Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) to filter CVs. Use standard section titles like 'Experience' and 'Skills'. Avoid images, tables, and uncommon fonts. Include relevant keywords from the job posting.
cv_tips_common_mistake_1: Using one CV for all jobs without customization.
cv_tips_common_mistake_2: Including too much unnecessary personal information.
cv_tips_common_mistake_3: Neglecting proofreading — typos can cost you interviews.
cv_tips_common_mistake_4: Making the CV too long (ideally 1–2 pages).
cv_tips_examples_desc: A strong CV is concise, results-oriented, and tailored to the position. For instance, a software engineer might showcase key projects, technologies used, and measurable outcomes instead of listing every minor task.
ats_title: What is the ATS System and How to Beat It?
ats_intro: On our website, we provide multiple ATS versions for free. The ATS (Applicant Tracking System) helps recruiters filter and rank resumes automatically before a human sees them, and you can test your CV directly using our tools.
ats_1_title: Use Keywords from the Job Description
ats_1_text: Our free ATS versions check for exact matches of skills, software, and qualifications mentioned in the job posting, ensuring your CV is properly recognized by recruiters.
ats_2_text: All our ATS tools read plain text perfectly. Avoid images, graphics, and tables in your CV, and use clean formatting so the system can scan your information correctly.
ats_3_text: Stick to standard formats like Word (.docx) or PDF. Our ATS tools support these formats and are designed to parse simple, professional CV layouts without errors.
ats_4_text: Use clear headings such as 'Work Experience', 'Education', and 'Skills'. Our ATS versions are optimized to recognize these common headings and rank your CV accordingly.
ats_5_text: Include measurable examples like 'Improved sales by 20%' to highlight your accomplishments. Our ATS tools detect numbers and key metrics to help your CV stand out.
ats_6_text: Place all essential information in the main body of your CV. Our ATS versions ignore content in headers and footers to ensure accurate scanning.
ats_7_text: Use simple bullet points (• or -) to list responsibilities and achievements. Fancy icons or graphics may not be recognized by our ATS tools.
ats_8_text: You can upload and test your CV using any of our free ATS versions to see how it performs and make improvements.
ats_9_text: Tailor your CV for each job application. Our multiple ATS versions help you ensure that every submission is optimized for the position.
ats_10_text: Focus on clarity, relevance, and keyword optimization. Our ATS tools are designed to work with simple, professional CVs to maximize your chances of success.
ats_conclusion: Using our free ATS versions, you can make your CV both machine-readable and attractive to recruiters without any cost.
about_text: Our website is designed to empower students, professionals, and developers alike to create professional CVs completely for free.
We provide more than 50 ready-to-use templates, each carefully crafted to suit different industries, job roles, and personal styles.

Whether you prefer a classic design or a modern, sleek look, our platform has a template for you. All templates are fully editable: you can change colors, fonts, sections, and layouts to perfectly match your personal branding.
Our platform also features an integrated ATS (Applicant Tracking System) simulator, allowing you to test your CV and ensure it passes automated recruiter screening.
You can create multiple versions of your CV, save them, download them as PDF, and even generate unlimited copies for different applications.
Key benefits of our platform include:
1. Completely Free: All features, templates, and ATS tools are free of charge.
2. 50+ Templates: Choose from dozens of professional designs suitable for any job role.
3. ATS Compatible: Ensure your CV passes through automated tracking systems easily.
4. Unlimited Versions: Create and save as many versions as you need.
5. PDF Export: Download your CV in high-quality PDF format.
6. Full Customization: Edit colors, fonts, and layout to match your style.
7. Easy to Use: Simple, intuitive interface that anyone can use without prior experience.
8. Multi-Industry Support: Templates designed for tech, marketing, finance, education, and more.
9. Secure Storage: Save your CVs safely on our platform.
10. Mobile-Friendly: Build and edit your CV directly from your phone or tablet.
11. Instant Preview: See real-time updates as you edit your CV.
12. Copy & Duplicate: Make multiple versions of your CV for different applications.
13. Highlight Achievements: Emphasize your experience, skills, and accomplishments.
14. Download History: Keep track of all your downloaded CVs.
15. Shareable Links: Share your CV online via a link.
16. Professional Guidance: Tips and suggestions on how to optimize each CV.
17. Custom Sections: Add sections like Projects, Certifications, and Volunteer Work.
18. No Hidden Costs: Everything is accessible without any subscriptions.
19. Safe & Private: Your data is secure and never shared with third parties.
20. Continuous Updates: We constantly add new templates and features based on user feedback.
Our platform is perfect for students, job seekers, and professionals who want to create, edit, and share polished CVs effortlessly.
With unlimited downloads, multiple copies, ATS optimization, and complete customization, our CV builder gives you everything you need to succeed in the job market – all for free.
privacy_text: We respect your privacy and take the protection of your personal information seriously.
Any information you provide, including your name, email, or CV data, is collected solely to improve our services and enhance your experience on our platform.
We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with any third parties under any circumstances.
Your CVs, templates, and personal data are stored securely on our servers with advanced encryption measures to prevent unauthorized access.
We may use aggregated, non-identifiable data to analyze trends and improve our services, but this data cannot be traced back to any individual user.
We comply with all applicable data protection laws and regulations to ensure your rights are fully protected.
You have full control over your personal information. You can edit or delete your account and all related data at any time.
We may occasionally send you updates, tips, or notifications about new features and templates. You can opt out of these communications at any time.
Our platform uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance functionality, track usage, and improve user experience. These do not contain personal information.
We never store sensitive information like passwords in plain text; all sensitive data is encrypted and protected.
Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only, who are trained in privacy and data security practices.
In case of any changes to our privacy policy, we will notify users in advance and provide a clear explanation of the updates.
By using our platform, you consent to our privacy practices as outlined, and we commit to keeping your data safe and confidential.
We value your trust and are committed to transparency in how we collect, store, and use your information.
If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, our support team is always available to assist you promptly.
